name: Large-Cap Daily Momentum with Volume Surge
description: Long-only momentum strategy trading large-cap U.S. equities on daily bars. Enters when 10-day ROC exceeds +3 %, 5-day volume MA is ≥30 % above its 20-day MA, and both 10- and 20-day price SMAs are rising. Positions risk max 1 % of equity with a 7 % stop and 18 % profit target. Exits early if ROC falls below +1 % or price closes under the 10-day SMA.
